name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.43
lastChange: Overhauled UI with new icons. Implemented Week and Day views in the Calendar. Enhanced AI Studio with API status checks and image/market generation. Fixed timestamp inaccuracies in chronicles.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
